attributes.action: a total  withdrawal  from  all shops/ supermarkets of  a Bevrage  known as  white  lightning,
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this can/bottle drink contain little or no apples, but large amounts of sulphuir dioxied, sugar.& sweetener & @ 7.5% vol of alc + other unknow chem's. when consume the result is rapid addiction.leading to total dependency  which cause untold damage to families & business .A like; rapid health loss. & actions of drinkers of this so call cider!is destrucitev; at 85p per can(500ml) & 1:99p for a 2 liter bottle: made by Inch's cider co. hereford hr4 0le [R.t.m.o] i respectfully  request a total bann on this beverage  to  prevent  futher deaths & suffering  by families throughout  the country:
